header.name: Jonas Larsson
header.summary:
Hi, everyone! My name is Jonas and I’m a frontend developer who loves building user interfaces and creating websites that are both easy to use and visually appealing. I have experience developing forms and tools that simplify complex tasks for users – particularly in the finance and comparison space. I take pride in crafting smooth, intuitive experiences that make a difference.

As a frontend developer, I’m always learning and staying updated with the latest trends and best practices in web development. I’m excited about where technology is heading and how I can continue growing alongside it.
Thanks for taking the time to get to know me a little better. I’m looking forward to sharing more of my experiences and insights with you!

footer.text: Made with ❤️ using Vue 3 + TypeScript + Vite

content.heading: Aug 2018 - May 2020 | EC Utbildning
content.description: Frontend Developer YH program at EC Utbildning in Helsingborg, Sweden. The program focused on web development, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and various frameworks and libraries.
I have a strong understanding of HTML and its semantic elements. I can create well-structured and accessible web pages.
I have experience with Vue.js and its ecosystem, including Vue Router and Vuex. I can build dynamic and interactive web applications using Vue.
I have a solid understanding of CSS and its features, including Flexbox and Grid. I can create responsive and visually appealing layouts.
I have experience with SASS and its features, including variables, nesting, and mixins. I can write maintainable and modular CSS using SASS.
I have a strong understanding of Node.js and its ecosystem. I can build server-side applications and APIs using Node.
I have experience with npm and its features, including package management and scripts. I can manage dependencies and automate tasks using npm.
I have a solid understanding of JavaScript and its features, including ES6+ syntax. I can write clean and efficient code using JavaScript.
I have experience with TypeScript and its features, including static typing and interfaces. I can write type-safe code using TypeScript.
I have experience with React and its ecosystem, including React Router and Redux. I can build dynamic and interactive web applications using React.
I have experience with Vite and its features, including fast development and build times. I can set up and configure Vite for my projects.
I have experience with Pinia and its features, including state management and reactivity. I can use Pinia to manage application state in Vue.js.
I have experience with GraphQL and its features, including queries and mutations. I can build APIs using GraphQL and integrate them into my applications.
I have experience with Docker and its features, including containerization and orchestration. I can use Docker to create and manage containers for my applications.
I have experience with Git and GitHub for version control and collaboration. I can use Git to manage my code and collaborate with others.
I have experience with Postman for API testing and documentation. I can use Postman to test and document my APIs.
I have experience with Figma for UI/UX design and prototyping. I can use Figma to create and collaborate on design projects.
I have experience with Go and its features, including concurrency and performance. I can build efficient and scalable applications using Go.
I have experience with MySQL and its features, including database design and querying. I can use MySQL to manage and query relational databases.
